name: nats
description: Node.js client for NATS, a lightweight, high-performance cloud native messaging system

0.3.0.name: nats

0.4.0.name: nats
0.4.0.description: Node.js client for NATS, a lightweight, high-performance cloud native messaging system

0.4.2.name: nats
0.4.2.description: Node.js client for NATS, a lightweight, high-performance cloud native messaging system

scripts.lint: jshint --reporter node_modules/jshint-stylish lib/*.js test/*.js test/support/*.js examples/*.js
scripts.test:unit: mkdir -p reports/ && NODE_ENV=test multi='spec=- xunit=reports/mocha-xunit.xml' istanbul cover _mocha -- -R mocha-multi --timeout 10000 --slow 750 && istanbul check-coverage
scripts.test: npm run depcheck && npm run depcheck:unused && npm run lint && npm run test:unit

0.6.8.name: nats
0.6.8.description: Node.js client for NATS, a lightweight, high-performance cloud native messaging system

scripts.lint: jshint --reporter node_modules/jshint-stylish lib/*.js test/*.js test/support/*.js examples/*.js
scripts.test:unit: mkdir -p reports/ && NODE_ENV=test multi='spec=- xunit=reports/mocha-xunit.xml' istanbul cover _mocha -- -R mocha-multi --timeout 10000 --slow 750 && istanbul check-coverage
scripts.test: npm run depcheck && npm run depcheck:unused && npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./reports/coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
